commitMessage:
@@@[CodeRefactor] #4098 Make FE multi module (#4099)

This PR change the FE code structure to maven multi module structure. 
See ISSUE: #4098 for more info.  such as How to resolve conflicts.

@@@[New Feature]Support udf  when loading data (#4863)

Many time.  our users want to use UDFs they developed to ETL the data
when loading the data into Doris.
But currently.  broker load does not support to use UDF.
As UDF belongs to a database.  it needs to check whether it has the SELECT permission of the database.
This patch try to solve this problem.

@@@[Feature] Support backup. restore. load. export directly connect to s3 (#5399)

* [doris-1008] support backup and restore directly to cloud storage via aws s3 protocol

* Internal][S3DirectAccess] Support backup. restore. load. export directlyconnect to s3
1. Support load and export data from/to s3 directly.
2. Add a config to auto convert broker access to s3 acces when available
